price: Y cuando se encontraba camino a Madián dijo: "¡Pueda que mi Señor me guie por el camino correcto!"
arabic: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walammā tawajjaha til'qāa madyana qāla ʿasā rabbī an yahdiyanī sawāa al-sabīli
